Package wtf.choco.dragoneggdrop.particle.condition

Class ConditionFactory

java.lang.Object
wtf.choco.dragoneggdrop.particle.condition.ConditionFactory
public final class ConditionFactory
extends Object
A factory in which EquationCondition instances may be created. Factory methods must be registered here alongside unique names in order for DragonEggDrop to recognize them when parsing a ParticleShapeDefinition from a JSON file.
Author:
Parker Hawke

  • Method Details

    • registerCondition

      public static void registerCondition​(String name, Function<com.google.gson.JsonObject,​? extends EquationCondition> factoryMethod)
      Register a condition factory method.
      Parameters:
      name - the condition's unique name
      factoryMethod - the method used to create an instance

    • create

      public static EquationCondition create​(String name, com.google.gson.JsonObject object)
      Create an EquationCondition given the JsonObject for the condition.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the condition to create
      object - the json data for the condition
      Returns:
      the created equation. null if no condition was registered with the given name
